input_text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to transfer files between two ios devices with airdisk pro?
input_text.Response A:
Yes, I can tell you how to transfer files between two iOS devices with AirDisk Pro.

AirDisk Pro is a software that allows you to connect your iOS device to your computer and transfer files between the two. To use AirDisk Pro, you will need to download the software and connect your iOS device to your computer. Once your device is connected, you can drag and drop files from your computer to your device, or vice versa.

AirDisk Pro also has a feature that allows you to back up your iOS device to your computer. This is a great way to keep a copy of your important files in case something happens to your device.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
